tags: None
review: She is very amicable. Listens to the issues carefully and gives mental support along with proper diagnosis and medication.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted with Dr. Rituparna Roy for severe Post COVID weakness/symptoms along with the long term issue of Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (CFS). Dr Roy is well aware of Post COVID issues and treatment as well as one of the rare doctors who is also aware of CFS. I also received a few home visits by Dr. Shrikant Mishra for face to face patient evaluation and also for getting saline IV drip at home. Dr. Mishra is very competent and has a jovial, engaging personality and a great bedside manner. I am very satisfied with both doctors who are polite, patient and attentive and certainly do recommend them.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I'm aged 72, suffered from fever with Cough and cold in 1stweek of Oct, took home remedies with antibiotics, but couldn't overcome it, lucky to have consulted Dr Rituparna Roy,a very knowledgeable doctor, very different than the current breed of consultants,as she relies on her diagnostic ability, physical examination,so doesn't overtest,overdrug you,got admitted in her boutique docville nursing home, within a week was up on feet ,ably supported by her 2ndin command Dr Shrikant, with a bill which would have costed me in a day at Ambani hospital! I wish more people come to consult her at Kulkarni hospital yamuna nagar Lokhandwala complex Andheri West, and get benefitted!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We went to Dr Roy, for consultation of my Mother Mrs Bhupinder Bhalla age 81yrs ECG report.
as her report says Sinus arrhythmia, rest all ok.
She compared her previous ECG report & she figured out May she wasn‚Äôt breathing properly while undergoing the ECG test & her observation were bang on , The next ECG undertaken on her advice ,was perfect without any variation. 
Thankyou Doc, really impressed by your calm, relax composure & friendly attitude & keen listener. 
God bless you. üôèüèºüôèüèº

*** **** ** ****** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** **** ***
She has not only provided me with the best of treatment but she has also remembered each and every detail of my condition.(even though the last visit was about 6 months ago) 
I would highly and definitely recommend her!
reply_text: Thanks dear... really it means a lot

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: It's was a great experience overall . Dr Srikant Mishra came al9ng with a nurse . They diagnosed the problem there and there and started the treatment . They waited for 3 hours till I was sorted out . Its been six days but he Dr Mishra still answers all my doubts and has been following up with me.

tags: None
review: My brother and I visited Doctor Ritupurna while at peak of our dengue. Doctor helped us with immediate diagnosis and started with our treatment right away. This helped us in our speedy recovery. We are glad to have come across Doctor Ritupurna on Practo. She also helped communicate our condition to our folks back home. Thanks, doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,

Highly recommend Dr.Rituparna Roy for everyone .she explains very clearly about the issue & she follow-up with the patient.she is one the best & humble doctor I have come across & the team or staff is highly professional
Thanks Dr Rituparna Roy & Team.

reply_text:
